items.name: Amritsari Chole Masala
items.description: Chickpeas cooked with onions, tomato, chillis and fresh spices to give it a zesty flavour
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + achar

items.name: Mangalore Style Chicken Urval
items.description: Fiesty chicken dish with lots of spices, curry leaves, coconut, cashews and lip smacking flavours
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + achar

items.name: Sweet Potato Patty
items.description: Full of fiber and nutrients, sweet potato mixed with herbs and spices and made into a patty and shallow fried. Served with spicy green chutney.

items.name: Anda Paratha
items.description: Whole wheat Indian bread stuffed with grated boiled egg mixed with spices. Served with spicy onion tomato chutney

items.name: Veg Bhuna Handi
items.description: Assorted veggies cooked in cream gravy with spices and fresh herbs.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + achar

items.name: Mumbai style Green Lamb Kheema
items.description: Minced lamb cooked in a base of green sauce with green peaces and other hot spices a dish definately to go for.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + achar

items.name: Bombay Cheese Chilli Toast
items.description: Famous Mumbai style grilled sandwich with spicy stuffing and loads of cheese. Perfect for an evening snack

items.name: Dal Kichidi
items.description: Rice with yellow lentils, garlic, chilles and tomato pressure cooked together and topped with chilles and spicy tadka. Served with papad + achar

items.name: Bhindi Do Pyaza
items.description: Okra cooked in onion tomato based gravy with freshly ground spices topped with petals of onion and tomato
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + achar

items.name: Kerala Chertha Kozhi Kari
items.description: Chicken and cashew curry with ginger, cardamom and chilli
items.extra: make it a meal with choice of 2 parathas/rice + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Beetroot Thepla
items.description: Beetroot puree mixed with whole wheat flour, spices, fresh corinader and flattened into a thin bread served with spicy tangy tomato onion chutney.

items.name: Chicken Kheema Paratha
items.description: Minced chicken cooked with differnt spices and stuffed in whole wheat dough, flattened and cooked on a pan. Served with spicy onion tomato dip

items.name: Panner Masala
items.description: Indian cottage cheese cooked in a flavourful base of onion and tomato with freshly ground spices
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + achar

items.name: Laal Maas
items.description: Delicious lamb curry cooked in ginger garlic paste, yogurt, turmeric and loads of spices giving it a zesty flavour
items.extra: make it a meal with choice of 2 parathas/rice + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Vegetable Cutlet
items.description: Mix vegetables and potato cooked with spices and coriander shaped into a patty and shallow fried. Served with spicy green chutney

items.name: Lemon Rice
items.description: Rice, cashews, chillies and other spices stir fried together and mixed with lime juice. Served with achar and papad

items.name: Veg Biryani
items.description: Assorted veggies slow cooked with aromatic basmati rice and spices topped with fried onions served with yogut dip + achar + papad

items.name: Chicken Tikka Biryani
items.description: Spicy chicken grilled over coal and cooked in a flavourful gravy of onion and tomato and other spices together with aromatic basmati rice and fried onions. Served with yogurt dip + achar + papad

items.name: Momos
items.description: Steamed vegetable dumplings served with spicy chutney

items.name: Tamarind rice
items.description: Rice mixed with tamarind juice, peanut and spices, topped with curry leaves. Served with papad.

items.name: Achari Paneer Channa Pulao
items.description: Chickpeas and Indian cottage cheese cooked with onion, garlic, ginger and pickling spices mixed with aromatic basmati rice topped with fresh coriander. Served with yogurt dip + achar + papad

items.name: Kolambi Bhat
items.description: Flavourful prawns cooked with ginger, garlic, onion and other spices combined with aromatic basmati rice and fresh coriander served wih yogurt dip + papad + achar

items.name: Veg Spring Roll
items.description: Mix veggies rolled in a thin sheet and deep fried for a crispy outer shell served with spicy chutney

items.name: Rava Upma
items.description: Semolina cooked together with onion, tomato, carrot and green peas and topped with ghee. A perfect light meal.

items.name: Tawa Paneer
items.description: Popular dish in Every Indian resturant. Indian cottage cheese cooked in spicy flavourful gravy with freshly ground spices and topped with onion and capsicum petals.
items.extra: Make it a meal with 2 parathas +side salad + achar+ salad

items.name: Lahori Green Chicken Curry
items.description: Chicken Cooked in spicy green gravy based with fresh ground spices and topped with cream.
items.extra: Make it a meal with 2 parathas/ rice +side salad + achar+ salad

items.name: Paneer schezwan Frankie
items.description: Spicy paneer cooked with chinese sauces, wrapped in roti with onion, cabbage, frankie masala. a perfect spicy snack. served with schezwan chtney for the extra spiciness

items.name: Panner tikka salad
items.description: Paneer marinated with tikka masalaa and grilled combined with lettuce, onion, tomato, toasted bread cubes, bell peppper, cucumber and lemon honey dressing amking it a poper packed salad

items.name: Kashmiri Dum Aloo
items.description: Baby potatoes roasted and cooked in tangy , spicy and flavourful Yogurt based gravy.
items.extra: Make it a meal with 2 parathas +side salad + achar+ salad

items.name: Pork Bafat masala
items.description: Pork cooked with onions, ginger, chillies and garlic and spicy bafat masala a Manglorean dish definately worth trying for
items.extra: Make it a meal with 2 parathas/ rice +side salad + achar+ salad

items.name: Dahi papadi Chat
items.description: A street style snack of papadi smeared with thick yogurt mix topped with spicy green chutney, tangy sweet chutney, pomagrante seeds, chatmasala and sev

items.name: Quina chickpea protein pack salad
items.description: Quina,chickpea, cucumber, onion, lettuce, feta cheese, tomato, olives combied together and topped with sme zesty lemon, garlic, olive oil dressing

items.name: Soya Chunks aloo Dum
items.description: Soya bean chunks and roasted potatoes cooked with cramalised onion, tomato puree, ginger , garlic and spices into a flavourful spicy curry
items.extra: Make it a meal with 2 parathas +side salad + achar+ salad

items.name: Kadhai Jhinga
items.description: Stir fried prawns cooked with ginger, smoky chilles, tomato and fresh coriander
items.extra: Make it a meal with 2 parathas +side salad + achar+ salad

items.name: Kurkure Aloo tikki chat (2 tikki)
items.description: Mashed potato patty cooked till crisp smeared with spicy chutney and sweet tangy chutney , sev , tomato,onions and fresh corinader and pomagrante seeds.

items.name: Pav Bhaji
items.description: Mix of different veggies boiled and cooked in a spicy flavourful gravy of onion, tomato and  gresh pav bhaji spices topped with buteer and fresh coriander served with 2 pav ( buns)

items.name: Khumb Matar Malai
items.description: Creamy   button mushroom curry with cardamom, cashew nut and green peas with freshly ground spices making it a warm and comforting meal.
items.extra: Make it a meal with 2 parathas +side salad + achar+ salad

items.name: Champaran Lamb Curry
items.description: A dish from the nothern part of India with spicy flavourful lamb pieces cooked togteher spices, chillies, garlic, ginger and fresh ground spies, slow cooked on low flame till perfection.
items.extra: Make it a meal with 2 parathas/ rice +side salad + achar+ salad

items.name: Bhel puri
items.description: Street style snack of puffed rice mixed with spicy chutney, sweet tangy chutney, papadi, sev, onion, tomato and fresh coriander making it a flavourful snack

items.name: Oats and rava idli + Chutney
items.description: Oats ,semolina (granuled wheat) mixed with yogurt, onion,cashew and chilles and steam to make soft buns served with coconut chutney.

items.name: Veg Navratna Pulao
items.description: Assorted veggies,cashew nut and rasins cooked together with spices with fragnant basmati rice and topped with fresh coriander and mint leaves served with a side of mint dip+ papad+ achar

items.name: Thalassery Briyani
items.description: A briyani from the regions of malabar,Chicken cooked with cramalised onions, cashew, yogurt spicies and coconut milk with cooked with small grain rice topped with mint leaves , coriander and fried onion served with yogurt dip+ acahar + papad

items.name: Street style Veg manchurian Frankie
items.description: Assorted veggied mixed with cinese spices and sauces fried till crispy and wrapped in roti with onion, cabbage and noodles

items.name: Anda Ghotala
items.description: Scrambled eggs cooked with onion, chilies and other spices in a thick sauce topped with a half fried egg Served with 2 buns

items.name: Burnt Garlic  Fried Rice
items.description: Indo-chinese dish with assorted veggies and rice cooked with chinese sauces and topped with crispy burnt garlic flakes.
items.extra: Make it more delicious with paneer in soy basil sauce

items.name: Chicken Burnt garlic Fried Rice
items.description: Indo-chinese dish with assorted veggies, boneless chicken and rice cooked with chinese sauces and topped with crispy burnt garlic flakes.
items.extra: Make it more delicious with  chicken manchurian gravy

items.name: Vada pav (2)
items.description: Street food of mumbai, boiled potatoes coated with chickpea flour and spices and fried to perfection stuffed in a bun smeared with spicy green chutney and dry garlic chutney making it flavourful

items.name: Coconut Rice
items.description: Aromatic basmati rice cooked in ghee with cashew, curry leaves, dried chilli and fresh coconut and tempered with mustard seeds
